# Statistical Analysis

## Loading the data
```{r}
data(mtcars)
str(mtcars)
```

## Scatter Plot
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
mtcars$gear <- factor(mtcars$gear)
ggplot(data = mtcars, aes(x=disp, y=mpg,colour = gear))+
  geom_point()+
  labs(x="Displacement",y="Miles Per Gallon",
       colour = "Gear")
```

data(mtcars)
str(mtcars)
